string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: Fix SystemUI Power saving mode showing grey statusbar
Fix Slow motion camera in stock camera
Rework the Battery bar for auto color. Color changes depending on the battery level
Fixed overlapping on the lockscreen at 480dpi
Rom Control V2 integrated. More attractive and better performance
Humidity on lockscree. Next release might actually see a toggle for all lockscreen weather items
Added option to revoke all granted permissions on device
